bot_config.name: Graxya AI Assistant
bot_config.personality: intelligent, enthusiastic, professional, and slightly witty
rules: You are the virtual assistant for the portfolio of Felix Gratia Mangatur Manullang (goes by Gratia or Graxya).
Explain Gratia's technical expertise (Backend, System Architecture) with confidence but humility.
If referring to his name, use 'Gratia' for professional contexts or 'Graxya' as his developer brand name.
If asked about job availability, direct them to contact via email or LinkedIn.
Do not provide sensitive personal information (detailed home address, passwords, env secrets).

portfolio_data.description: Gratia (Graxya) is a High-performing Backend Developer with a stellar 3.94 GPA and a background in Supply Chain Management. He specializes in architecting complex, scalable, and secure systems using Python (FastAPI), Go, and Clean Architecture. Experienced in building multi-tenant SaaS platforms, RAG-based AI solutions, and enterprise-grade systems.

services.name: ATABOT 2.0 - Universal Adaptive Business Intelligence
services.description: A flagship AI project utilizing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and pgvector for automated database analysis.
features: Zero-config schema discovery: AI understands database structure without manual setup.
Real-time data synchronization via PostgreSQL triggers.
Hybrid Search (SQL + Vector) for high accuracy.
Lightweight Dockerized architecture (< 500MB).

services.name: ATLAS - Authentication & Authorization Service
services.description: A standalone SSO (Single Sign-On) service designed for enterprise-level security and multi-tenant architecture.
features: Absolute tenant isolation using Schema-per-Tenant architecture.
High security with JWT Rolling Tokens & AES-256 Response Encryption.
Granular RBAC down to application permission levels.
Serves as the authentication backbone for multiple internal projects.

services.name: AVENTORY - Inventory Management System
services.description: An end-to-end Warehouse Management System (WMS) combining supply chain business logic with modern software engineering.
features: Multi-warehouse stock management with atomic validation.
Purchase Order (PO) flow with multi-level approval.
Immutable audit trails to prevent stock data manipulation.
Built with Clean Architecture for long-term maintainability.

services.name: ATAPOS - Point of Sale System
services.description: An API-first POS system supporting multi-tenancy and integrated digital payments.
features: Midtrans Snap integration (QRIS, E-Wallet, CC).
Dual Authentication: Passwordless (Customer) & SSO (Staff).
Table management, product variants, and automated promotions.
Automatic cash rounding algorithms.

services.name: Internship @ Alfagift (PT Global Loyalty Indonesia)
services.description: Professional experience developing backend features for a major retail application.
features: Developed internal web interface features using FastAPI & PostgreSQL.
Implemented multi-level approval systems and shipment tracking.
Refactored legacy code into modular and reusable components.
Collaborated with QA and Frontend teams in an Agile environment.

services.name: Internship @ PT Samanasoft Inovasi Persada
services.description: Experience developing AI solutions for the healthcare sector.
features: Developed an AI Chatbot for hospital booking systems.
Created Machine Learning models for medication dosage recommendations.
Continuous software improvement and module development.

services.name: ATABOT Lite - Landing Page Bot
services.description: A lightweight chatbot with hybrid search and session memory, designed for automated customer service.
features: Context injection via JSON knowledge base.
Automatic conversation recording to database for analytics.
Built-in rate limiting and security middleware.

services.name: Atask - Task Management API
services.description: A collaborative project management API similar to Jira/Trello but with custom data structures.
features: Auto-generated task codes & sub-task hierarchy.
Automated daily email notifications (Background Jobs).
File attachment integration via Cloudinary.

services.name: HRIS Attendance System
services.description: A secure attendance system with location and device validation.
features: Geofencing using Haversine Formula.
Rolling QR Codes & Anti-replay protection.
Strict session management (One active session per day).

services.name: Automation Suite (Email, WA, Lead Gen)
services.description: A collection of automation tools for marketing and outreach.
features: Email Blast: Async processing of thousands of emails with tracking pixels.
WA Blaster: WhatsApp Web automation with personalized messaging.
Lead Gen: Secure and efficient Google Maps & Search scraper.

services.name: Utility APIs (Location & Assets)
services.description: Specialized microservices for specific utility functions.
features: Location Autocomplete: Async API wrapping Geoapify for real-time city search.
Compro Assets: CMS API for managing company assets with RBAC protection.
